articles.author: Will Davies, Siddharth Vikram Philip
articles.title: Airlines Suspend Flights After Israel Declares State of War - Bloomberg
articles.description: The three major US airlines halted flights with Israel after it was attacked by Hamas over the weekend, while some Middle Eastern and European carriers continued to give passengers an exit route from the developing war.
